commentText: This deck was awesome.  Really great Algebra facts!!
This deck was OK.  I wish it had more historical dates to study instead of vocab.
I loved this deck!  Ms. Wang can really make science cool.  Her deck made learning these biology terms easy.
Ugh, trickle down economics is sooooo boring.
Diseases are gross. I guess this deck was good.
Ok, who knew there was so much to learn about The Grapes of Wrath.
